name: Fext
resist: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage with nonmagical weapons
languages: the languages spoken by its patron

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
text: The fext's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 15). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Magic Resistance
text: The fext has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
text: The fext's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Patron Blessing
text: A fext is infused with a portion of their patron's power. They have an Armor Class equal to 10 + their Charisma modifier + their Dexterity modifier.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The fext makes two melee or ranged attacks.

action.name: Eldritch Blade
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d6+2) slashing damage plus 16 (3d10) force damage.

action.name: Eldritch Fury
text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 60/200 ft., one creature. Hit: 25 (4d10 + 3) force damage.
